original_text: And when they came to Nachon's threshingfloor, Uzzah put forth his hand to the ark of God, and took hold of it; for the oxen shook it.
korean_text: 그들이 나곤의 타작 마당에 이르러서는 소들이 뛰므로 웃사가 손을 들어 하나님의 궤를 붙들었더니

sentences.original_text: And when they came to Nachon's threshingfloor
Uzzah put forth his hand to the ark of God
